title: Question Every Dagger: Wednesday, October 19th, 2022
description:
1. Olivia Wilde Shares Her Special Salad Dressing Recipe in Response to Former Nanny's Allegations (PEOPLE) (22:32)
  2. Matthew Perry nearly died from opioid overuse and secretly spent weeks in a coma (Daily Mail) (32:37)
  3. Meghan Markle's Revelations from 'Variety' Interview (Including Prince Harry's In-N-Out Obsession!) (PEOPLE) (39:39)
  4. Daniel Craig Receives His Royal Honor from Princess Anne: 'We've Been Expecting You' (PEOPLE) (46:04)
  5. Ramons Singer trashes 'RHONY' spinoff, calls it 'The Loser Show' (Page Six) (48:32)
- Dear Toasters Advice Segment (57:15)

The Toast with Jackie  (@JackieOshry) and Claudia Oshry  (@girlwithnojob) 
NLOG Tickets
Merch
The Toast Patreon
Girl With No Job by Claudia Oshry
